meanings: Noun (뮤지컬·영화에서) 많은 출연자들이 함께 노래하고 춤추는 장면

vlive.korean: 우리 제작진들 또 진짜... Our production crew really... 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : 한국도착!!
또 곡을 만들면서 어려웠던 점 있나요? Any difficulties during the production period? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#373. 스키즈 어워즈 (w. 스페셜 DJ 스트레이키즈 현진&방찬 with 스트레이키즈)
vlive.english: Any difficulties during the production period?

vlive.korean: 이것이 무엇인가 - 열려라 아돌라 제작진 지갑의 문! What is this? - Open the production team's wallet! 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#378. 열려라 에이티즈 (스페셜 DJ AOA 지민&찬미 with 에이티즈)
vlive.english: What is this? - Open the production team's wallet!

vlive.korean: [새로운 선물을 제작한 김종현 (25/디패제작진?] [JR who created a new gift] [25 / Dispatch production team(?)] View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “제티로그2편” (종현 : 태용)
vlive.english: [JR who created a new gift] [25 / Dispatch production team(?)]

vlive.korean: [제작진] [카메오 출연을 어떻게 하게 됐는지?] [Production staff] [How did you come to appear as the cameo?] View video OSEN : ZICO 지코, '남겨짐에 대해' MV 코멘터리 #스타로드 02
vlive.english: [Production staff] [How did you come to appear as the cameo?]

examples.korean: The production process is to be streamlined. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 생산 과정이 간소화되어야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The production process is to be streamlined. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He has recorded the narration for the production. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 작품의 내레이션을 녹음했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has recorded the narration for the production. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The production process is now highly mechanized. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 생산 과정은 이제 고도로 기계화되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The production process is now highly mechanized. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was a new production technique aimed at minimizing wastage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 낭비를 최소화하기 위한 새로운 생산 기법이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was a new production technique aimed at minimizing wastage. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Our new production of ‘Hamlet’ is currently in rehearsal. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 새로 제작하는 ‘햄릿’은 현재 리허설 중이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our new production of ‘Hamlet’ is currently in rehearsal. Add to Wordbook
